        public static <T> java.util.function.Consumer<T> action​(java.lang.String description,

        This method creates a consumer with some string description. This consumer is supposed to perform some action.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of accepted value
        Parameters:
        description - string narration of the action
        consumer - which performs the action
        Returns:
        a new consumer with the given string description. Description is returned by the Object.toString() method.

      • toGet

        public static <T,R> java.util.function.Function<T,R> toGet​(java.lang.String description,
                                                           java.util.function.Function<T,R> function)
        This method creates a function with some string description. This function is supposed to get some value.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the input value
        R - type of the value to get
        Parameters:
        description - string narration of the getting value
        function - which gets the needed value

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
        description - string narration of the conditions
        predicate - which checks some input value
        Returns:
